name: Penmia
tag_list: notebook, diary, journal, capture, record, memories, moments, tags, posts, tabs, customize, secure, protected, encrypted, private, free, mobile-app
overview:
Penmia is a free, secure online journal that allows you to capture, organize, and share your memories like you never have before. It lets you capture absolutely anything—from the books you read, to the vacations you experience, to your daily jogging schedule, and everything in between. With bank-level security, all of your memories and data are always kept safe and secure.

The easy-to-use application allows you to easily categorize your memories by tabs and organize memories within those tabs by using the tagging feature. You can also attach photos to posts as well as links to external sites. Other great features allow you to import and export data and even tweet your memories directly from Penmia. Users can also customize their Penmia tabs exactly how they want! Whether you post a lot or a little, prefer certain fonts over others, or like bright colors instead of dark colors, users can mix and match according to their needs and make each tab customized specifically to the memories they are capturing! Penmia even allows you to securely share what memories you want, when you want and with whomever you want - while keeping your other Penmia memories completely private!
